pr_title: [Cleanup] Replace manual subscription handling with ViewModel

timeline.message: Add annotations based on base class
Move photo field elements into separate layout
Replace RxCall with photo_view.xml and PhotoFieldViewModel

timeline.bodyText: It appears this method is called both from init() and here. Is this intentional? If so, why?
timeline.author: gino-m

replies.bodyText: init() takes an ObservableMap as a parameter and calls updateField() whenever the response is changed. Here, we don't use init() as this is an one time update.
replies.author: shobhitagarwal1612

replies.bodyText: Makes me wonder if init() should a part of PhotoFieldViewModel at all....
replies.author: shobhitagarwal1612
